title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 52.2 - Statement of policy
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 52.2 - Statement of policy

State Regulations

Whether or not the foreign banking corporation is required to
maintain eligible assets pursuant to the provisions of this Part, it is hereby
declared to be the policy of the Banking Board that the foreign banking
corporation shall maintain at the branch or agency the evidence of
indebtedness, or other documentation, for any asset which appears in the books, accounts and records of that branch or agency as an asset of such branch or
agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
52.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
